Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 2 Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka » 2.4 Kusalattika, Hetusahetukaduka » 2.4.1 Hetusahetukapada » 2.4.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa-adhipati
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Hetusahetukaduka
Hetusahetukapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa-adhipati
22.
1010Kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo kusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1011Akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo akusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1012Abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo abyākatassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1013Kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo kusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo akusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo abyākatassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
1014Akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo akusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1015Abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo abyākatassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1016Kusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo kusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1017Akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo akusalassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
1018Abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo abyākatassa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
23.
1019Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte tīṇi…pe…  upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, indriye magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1020Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1021Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1022Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1023(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
